short_summary: The Canadian Ministry of Defense requires ergonomic services for office settings.
description: Request for Proposals (RFP), Contract details will be found in the tender description section.
duration_in_months: She was given only 1 month and 21 days to complete the project
full_summary:
================================================================================
**Title**
[English]: Office Ergonomic Assessments
[French]: Évaluations ergonomiques des postes de travail

**Reference Number**
PW-22-01009963

**Tender Details**
=================================================================
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified bidders to provide office ergonomic assessment services.

**Requirements**
-----------

* The successful bidder will provide a comprehensive assessment of office ergonomic conditions.
* The period of the contract will be from the date of award to one year later, with four (4) one-year irrevocable options to extend the term.
* Tasks and deliverables are detailed in Annex A of the Request for Proposal.

**Language**
-----------

* English and French are the official languages of Canada, and bidders may submit documents in either language.
* Where the notice and the Request for Proposal (RFP) differ, the RFP will prevail.

**Trade Agreements**
----------------

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* For further information, please contact:
	+ Jeremy Quattrocchi
	+ Jeremy.Quattrocchi@forces.gc.ca
	+ National Defence Headquarters
		- 101 Colonel By Drive
		- Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

**Documents**
------------

* The following documents are attached to this notice:
	+ Request for Proposal (RFP) - Office Ergonomic Assessments
	+ Annex A - Tasks and Deliverables
* Please note that the RFP takes precedence over this notice in case of any discrepancies.

**Closing Date**
---------------

* The tender closed on December 16, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time.
